data.title: Best Web Hosting Company: Siteground.com
data.meta_description:
Best Web Hosting Company: Siteground.com 
This is a discussion on the “Siteground.com” entry in the Best Web Hosting Company SpiceList
data.text:
What service do you get for what price ? For $5 a month with siteground i get the following :

FREE domain name

750 GB web space

7500 GB traffic

99.9% server uptime

24/7 top customer care

FREE SiteBuilder

Unlimited email accounts

Unlimited mysql Databases

CPanel and Fantastico

And much much more. You can check out all the features on their site here SiteGround Web Hosting Plans - Full Feature List . I am not advertising for siteground and i dont make a dime for making this post. Im just trying to compare hosts and services rendred for price.

@Charles

Do you know if you “own” your domain name, or does siteground own it since it was free?

Me retaining ownership of my domain name is a big deal for me.
